ygData.subject: Re: Skill advancement
ygData.msgSnippet: You are almost to the point where you won t be able to solo whites or yellows anymore.  Some of the blues will give you a hard time too :)
ygData.messageBody:
You are almost to the point where you won't be able to solo whites or
yellows anymore. Some of the blues will give you a hard time too :)

> ----------
> From: James Schuldes[SMTP:jgs@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 8:05 AM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Skill advancement
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Your skills increase each time you use them no matter what the level of
> your
> opponent.
>
> You can stand over a spawn spot and swing away at rats and snakes for
> hours
> to build a new wep skill.
>
> Experience points are tied the level of the opponent though. But they are
> tied to other factors as well. I can swear that I have killed stuff that
> conned green (lower than blue) and have gotten xp from it. Why? I have no
> clue - maybe because you get a quota for each kind of mob in a zone? Or
> something. I'll max out on killing young lions which are/were blue and
> then
> have to slay a pesky bear which is green and get xp off the bear but not
> the
> young lion, go figure.
>
> As a rule, when I solo, I try not to attack yellows ('...quite a
> gamble...')
> or whites ('...looks like an even fight...') and of course not reds. I'd
> rather take more easy kills than suffer the heal time between long
> melee's.
> But I wonder if the gain in xp is worth it?
>
>
> Snyak
> Warrior of the 10th Level
> Qeynos, Antonica 53226
> Innoruuk
> "The opinions expressed herein are my own and do not
> necessarily reflect those of my Guild Master nor my Diety."
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: suzkim@... [mailto:suzkim@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 3:56 AM
> To: Warrior Mailing
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Skill advancement
>
> From: suzkim@...
>
> Greetings,
>
> I think this has been answered but I can't find the post.
>
> Can you only increase skills on critters that con blue?
>
> thanks,
>
> Az
>
>
